attributes.action: Amend the 2022 Highway Code. Scrap pedestrians right of way on junctions.
attributes.additional_details:
The reformed Highway Code of 2022 states the following:

- when people are crossing or waiting to cross at a junction, other traffic should give way.

Not only will this cause a rise in accidents, it will prove difficult for those with service dogs. Service dogs are trained to wait until there is no vehicle present; therefore, the service dog will not cross.

Additionally, this could cause a huge spike in accidents; undoubtedly. Bodies crossing before a moving vehicle could be fatal.
attributes.background: Alter the latest Highway Code. Do away with right of way for pedestrians on junctions.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607153
